admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
The overall outcome of the project is
            rated as satisfactory. Korea graduated from borrower status
            in June 1995; however, due to the recent financial crisis in
            East Asia, the government has asked for some structural
            adjustment and technical assistance loans. The design of
            this project was straight-forward and supervision work was
            well-coordinated, detailed, and cost-effective. Therefore,
            there are no major lessons to be learned from the project.
